TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IServiceGroupPartition

summary.para: Service group members inside a service group can cast the provided or to a to access the methods that are specific to members within service groups.

MemberSignature.Value: public T ResolveMember<T> (Uri name) where T : class;
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance !!T ResolveMember<class T>(class System.Uri name) cil managed

typeparam.name: T
typeparam.para: The type of the service member that should be resolved.

param.name: name
param.para: The fabric:/ name of the member to resolve.

summary.para: Enables the member to get direct access to the other members of the service group.

returns.para: Returns the member that is specified by name as an object of the specified type.

remarks.para: The method enables a service group member to obtain a direct reference to the other members in the group. The direct object-object communication with the other members does not require communication outside of the machine or virtual machine, either for communication with the Naming service to resolve the member or via some external transport to send the actual commands to the member.
